entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:02 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
